response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $8,000 to you. Considering the exceptional quality and benefits this product offers, I propose a price of $9,500. This price reflects a fair balance between the product's worth and my desire to ensure you receive the best possible deal. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to contribute to your success.", "product_price": 9500}
